components.description: A flat shoe, in a style generally worn by women. More practical than a high-heeled shoe.
components.title: Flat Shoe

title: Flat Shoe

version.description:
Unicode 11.0 was released on June 5, 2018. Emojis that require new code points for release are listed on this page but for the full 2018 emoji list see Emoji 11.0.

Emoji 11.0 includes every new emoji, including variations for skin tone, gender and new emojis that don't require additional code points, such as the chess pawn or pirate flag which are not shown on this page.

apple_vendor_description: Appleâ€™s flat shoe emoji displays a chic, minimalist design, showcasing a simple yet elegant flat shoe with soft rounded edges and a smooth, matte finish. Realistic lighting gives it a subtle dimensionality, hinting at its pliable construction. On Apple devices, this emoji evokes a sense of casual style, comfort, and practicality, often used to communicate about fashion, everyday activities, or a laid-back mood.
